pros: I have worked with several recruiting agencies over the past 10 years and Sasquatch from the very beginning understood what I was looking for and did not waste my time with anything that was not the right fit.
cons: Wish they worked in multiple markets such as San Francisco and Austin as I have a hard time finding credible companies in different locations that I am open to relocating to.
advice_to_mgmt: My advice to management is to work with me in the future on my next role hopefully a long time from now!
